name: GLITCH (itch) (juju136, kevinnc, Ephil, the-True-Blue)
description:
GLITCH

A mobile game where the player navigates a spaceship riddled with enemies and puzzles. Figure out where you are, and why the enemies don’t appear to be real… Solve all the puzzles to win the game.

https://github.com/Ephil012/Glitch

Controls:

  • Left joystick to move
  • Right buttons to interact
  • Two finger tap to rotate puzzle pieces
